getLineColor

public Color getLineColor()
See Also:
setLineColor(Color)

setLineColor

public void setLineColor(Color lineColor)
Sets a separate color for the graph line. By default the line takes the color of the series, but the lineColor setting allows setting a separate color for the line without altering the fillColor. Defaults to null

Parameters:
lineColor -

getFillColor

public Color getFillColor()
See Also:
setFillColor(Color)

setFillColor

public void setFillColor(Color fillColor)
Sets the fill color or gradient for the area. When null, the series' color is used with the series' fillOpacity. Defaults to null.

Parameters:
fillColor -

getFillOpacity

public Number getFillOpacity()
Returns:
Fill opacity or null if not defined
See Also:
setFillOpacity(Number)

setFillOpacity

public void setFillOpacity(Number fillOpacity)
Sets the fill opacity for the area. Defaults to .75.

Parameters:
fillOpacity -
